doc.title: Krzyk
doc.plot: A half-demented girl gets a job in a retirement home scrubbing floors and cleaning toilets. She develops a friendship with an invalid who is given a special care due to his wealth and former position. She also befriends an orderly, with whom she lives in a self-made shack. When he is turned down for an apartment, she tries to get money for him asking the invalid. When he refuses she smashes his head with the bottle and screams.
